body.name: Amazon Essentials Men's Tech Stretch Tank T-Shirt
features: RELAXED FIT: Comfortable, relaxed fit through shoulders, chest, and waist

TECH STRETCH FABRIC: An ultra-light weight and breathable fabric, with a soft smooth sheen finish. Made with quick dry and moisture-wicking finishes, helping you stay comfortable and cool while you workout. This knit fabric has a 4 way gentle stretch for full flexibility during wear.

ACTIVE TANK TOP: Train in confidence with this staple workout tank t-shirt. Designed with a longer body length for added coverage during workouts. Whether you're heading out for a jog, a quick game of basketball or running errands with the kids, our apparel is made to work out, live in, and lounge.
DETAILS: Featuring a pull-on crew neckline and a sleeveless racer back design for added mobility during workouts.
body.description: Placeholder text; placeholder text; placeholder text; placeholder text Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men’s must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon t-shirt is a fantastic budget-friendly option
reviews.reviewText: This Amazon t-shirt is a fantastic budget-friendly option for my morning cardio, and I must say, it's great for the price. While I typically avoid elastane and polyester, the fabric feels comfortable and breathable during workouts. Wearing a size M at 5'7", the fit is just right – not too tight or loose. Overall, it's a solid choice for activewear without breaking the bank

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great workout shirt
reviews.reviewText: The length is a little bit longer than most shirts, but the material and the other measurements are great. Will plan to get more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flex in Style
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Amazon Essentials Men's Tech Stretch Tank T-Shirt and let me tell you, I was pleasantly surprised by its quality and comfort. As someone who frequents the gym, I am always on the lookout for comfortable workout wear that won't break the bank. And this tank top definitely delivers.First off, let's talk about the fit. It hugs my body in all the right places without feeling too tight or restrictive. The material is made with a blend of polyester and spandex, which provides just the right amount of stretch to move around freely during workouts. I also love the fact that it's a tank top, which allows for maximum mobility and breathability.But the real kicker here is the design. I opted for the heather gray color and it looks great. It's simple, yet stylish and can easily be paired with any workout shorts or pants. Plus, it's versatile enough to wear outside of the gym too.Now, onto the funny part. I wore this tank top to the gym and got a few compliments from my buddies. One of them jokingly asked if I had been hitting the steroids because my arms looked huge in the tank top. We all had a good laugh and it just goes to show that this tank top is not only functional but also stylish.In terms of durability, I've worn and washed it a few times already and it still looks and feels great. It's held up well in the wash and hasn't lost its shape or color.Speaking of the price, that's another aspect of this tank top that I appreciate. It's very affordable and won't break the bank. Compared to other workout tank tops I've purchased in the past, this one is definitely a steal.But what really sets this tank top apart from others is the level of comfort it provides. As someone who sweats a lot during workouts, I appreciate that the material is moisture-wicking and keeps me feeling dry and cool. It also doesn't cling to my skin or chafe, which is a huge plus.In terms of sizing, I would say that it runs true to size. I typically wear a medium in most shirts and the medium in this tank top fit me perfectly. It's not too tight, but not too loose either.One thing to note is that the arm holes are slightly larger than I expected. It's not a huge deal, but if you're someone who prefers a more fitted look, you may want to consider sizing down.Another thing I like about this tank top is that it's versatile. While I primarily wear it for working out, it can also be worn for casual occasions. I've paired it with some denim shorts and sneakers and it looks great. It's a perfect summer outfit for a casual day out.But what really stood out to me is how easy it is to care for. I've washed it multiple times and it still looks great. It hasn't faded or shrunk, and it doesn't require any special care instructions. I just toss it in the washing machine with my other workout clothes and it comes out looking and feeling just as good as new.Overall, I would highly recommend the Amazon Essentials Men's Tech Stretch Tank T-Shirt to anyone in the market for a new workout tank top or a casual summer top. It's comfortable, versatile, and affordable, and it delivers on its promise of quality. I'm really happy with my purchase and will definitely be buying more in different colors. It's a 4 out of 5 stars for me, and the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of the slightly larger arm holes, but that's just a personal preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I have been very happy with the shirt. The shirt is made of a soft and stretchy fabric that is comfortable to wear and allows for a full range of motion. It is also lightweight and breathable, making it a great choice for hot summer days or intense workouts at the gym.One of the standout features of the tank top is its moisture-wicking technology. It effectively wicks away sweat and moisture, keeping me feeling cool and dry during my workouts. The shirt also has a quick-drying fabric, which helps to reduce the build-up of sweat and odor.In terms of fit, it is true to size and has a slim fit that looks great on its own. It is also easy to care for, with a machine washable fabric that holds up well to frequent washing.Overall, I highly recommend! It is a high-quality and comfortable shirt that is perfect for the gym or beach in the summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality but sizing could be better
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'10, 180lbs and fairly lean. This tank top has great build quality and a very silky and soft feel... unfortunately, it is quite baggy and long , despite fitting perfectly in the chest. I was planning to order a dozen more but dislike how oddly it fits on it. The waist should be a bit more narrow for a more "tapered" fit... I'd also make it 3" shorter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but durable
reviews.reviewText: I have three of these and one is about 2 years old and still looks new after running and lifting in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: great cotton! do not shrink after washing! Great option for everyday wear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Frumpy and Lop-sided
reviews.reviewText: Amazon told me that I was a XXL. I doubt if I’m a L width-wise. This garbage tank top is more like a crappy tent. What’s worse - the front is shorter than the back, so it fits about as well as OJ’s glove.Don’t waste your money on this crap. It isn’t worth paying for shipping to return it.

I loved the material and the camo design. Good summer/workout top. Nice dry fit breathable material. Size X-Large fit very nicely on my bf. Definitely will be buying another one in a different design!
Buen producto, me pareció un precio justo.

Grace au divers commentaire j’ai pu adapter maCommande en prenant du XS au lieu du S, et ledébardeur me va parfaitement. Parfait pour faire du sport, la matière me convient et je recommande fortement celui-ci ( à voir sur la durée). Une réelle question se pose, est-ce qu’Amazon va réapprovisionner les stocks des autres couleurs qui sont en Rupture de stock ?
